segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī … pe … sikkhamānā … sāmaṇero … sāmaṇerī … upāsako … upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “A nun … trainee nun … novice monk … novice nun … layman … laywoman … with five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātinī hoti, adinnādāyinī hoti, kāmesumicchācārinī hoti, musāvādinī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinī hoti.
segments.en: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: With these five qualities they’re cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A nun … female intern … novice monk … novice nun … layman … laywoman … with five qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā hoti, adinnādānā paṭiviratā hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā hoti, musāvādā paṭiviratā hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā hoti.
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: With these five qualities they’re raised up to heaven.”
